if JBP:AssertOptionsInitialized() then return end
JBP.IE:LoadGroup(false, false) JBP.IE.TabGroups.GROUP:Click()

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.border:SetColor(1, 0, 0) self.border:SetBorderSize(2)
self.CloseButton:Hide()
self.title:SetText("JustBecomePro") self.desc:SetText(JBP.L["NOGROUPS_DIALOG_BODY"]) self:SetScale(0.85) self.desc:SetWidth(self:GetWidth() - 20) self:SetHeight(self.desc:GetHeight() + 80)

JBP:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(JBP.L["UIPANEL_GROUPS_DROPDOWN"], JBP.L["UIPANEL_GROUPS_DROPDOWN_DESC"])
self.Button:HookScript("OnClick", function() GameTooltip:Hide() local GroupSelect = self:GetParent().GroupSelect GroupSelect:RequestReloadChildren() GroupSelect:SetShown(not GroupSelect:IsShown()) end)

JBP:CInit(self) self:SetDomain("profile")
local domainName = JBP.L["DOMAIN_PROFILE"] local title = JBP.L["UIPANEL_ADDGROUP2"]:format(domainName) local tooltip = JBP.L["UIPANEL_ADDGROUP2_DESC"]:format(domainName)
self.AddGroup.Name:SetText(title) JBP:TT(self.AddGroup, title, tooltip, 1, 1)

JBP:CInit(self) self:SetDomain("global") -- L["GLOBAL_GROUP_GENERIC_DESC"]
local domainName = JBP.L["DOMAIN_GLOBAL"] local title = JBP.L["UIPANEL_ADDGROUP2"]:format(domainName) local tooltip = JBP.L["UIPANEL_ADDGROUP2_DESC"]:format(domainName) .. "\r\n\r\n" .. JBP.L["GLOBAL_GROUP_GENERIC_DESC"]
self.AddGroup.Name:SetText(title) JBP:TT(self.AddGroup, title, tooltip, 1, 1)

local originalParent = self:GetParent()
JBP:CInit(self, "Config_GroupListContainer")
self:CScriptAdd("ReloadRequested", function() if self:GetParent() == JBP.IE.Pages.GroupMain then self:Hide() end end)
self.ProfileHeader:SetText(JBP.L["DOMAIN_PROFILE"]) self.GlobalHeader:SetText(JBP.L["DOMAIN_GLOBAL"])
self.border:SetBorderSize(2) self.border:SetColor(.25, .25, .25, 1)
function self:SetOriginalAnchor() self:SetParent(originalParent) self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", originalParent.GroupSelectDropdown, "BOTTOMLEFT", 2, 0) end
self:SetOriginalAnchor()
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton")
Scripts.OnShow:
self.timeAway = 0 self:SetFrameLevel(self:GetParent():GetFrameLevel() + 100)
local height = 0 height = max(height, select(4, self.Profile:GetBoundsRect())) height = max(height, select(4, self.Global:GetBoundsRect()))
height = height + 20
height = min(height, 400, self:GetTop() - JBP.IE.Tabs:GetBottom() + 2)
self:SetHeight(height)
Scripts.OnUpdate: if self:IsMouseOver() or self:GetParent() ~= JBP.IE.Pages.GroupMain or self:GetParent().GroupSelectDropdown:IsMouseOver() then self.timeAway = 0 else self.timeAway = (self.timeAway or 0) + elapsed if self.timeAway > 1 then self:Hide() end end

Scripts.OnLoad:
JBP:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(JBP.L["ICONMENU_ENABLE_PROFILE"], JBP.L["ICONMENU_ENABLE_PROFILE_DESC"]) self:SetSetting(JBP.db:GetCurrentProfile())
self:CScriptAdd("ReloadRequested", function() self:SetShown(JBP.CI.group and JBP.CI.group.Domain == "global") end)
self:CScriptAdd("SettingTableRequested", function(requester) return JBP.CI.gs and JBP.CI.gs.EnabledProfiles end)
self:CScriptAdd("SettingSaved", function() JBP:Update() JBP.IE:LoadGroup(1) end)
JBP:RegisterCallback("JBP_GLOBAL_UPDATE", function() self:SetSetting(JBP.db:GetCurrentProfile()) end)
self:GetParent().Enabled:ConstrainLabel(self) self:ConstrainLabel(self:GetParent(), "RIGHT")

JBP:CInit(self)
self:CScriptAdd("SettingTableRequested", function(requester) return JBP.CI.gs end)
-- This is redundant with the group setup below on ReloadRequested. --self:CScriptAdd("DescendantSettingSaved", function(requester) -- return JBP.CI.group:Setup() --end)
self:CScriptAdd("ReloadRequested", function(requester) local group = JBP.CI.group if group then group:Setup()
local panelList = {} for _, Component in pairs(group.Components) do if Component:ShouldShowConfigPanels(group) then for _, panelInfo in pairs(Component.ConfigPanels) do if panelInfo.panelSet == "group" then tinsert(panelList, panelInfo) end end end end
-- Pull any group config panels that are registered on icon modules local modules = group.viewData.ModuleImplementors for _, implementationData in pairs(modules) do local class = JBP.C[implementationData.moduleName]
if class and class.inherits[JBP.C.IconModule] and group.viewData:DoesImplementModule(class.className) then for _, panelInfo in pairs(class.ConfigPanels) do if panelInfo.panelSet == "group" then tinsert(panelList, panelInfo) end end end end
JBP.IE:PositionPanels("GroupMain", panelList) end end)

Scripts.OnShow:
local GroupSelect = JBP.IE.Pages.GroupMain.GroupSelect
GroupSelect:SetParent(self) GroupSelect:ClearAllPoints() GroupSelect:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 30, -50) GroupSelect:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", -30, 30) GroupSelect:Show()
